title: The Undressing Room (A Taboo Lesbian First Time Quickie)
description: When Desiree married Andrew, she knew she needed to win the heart of his little brat too. But no matter how hard she tries, Desiree just can’t seem to get Sara to open up to her. So when the man of the house goes out of town on business and insists his girls spend some quality time getting to know each other, Desiree is determined to go all the way to make her husband’s little princess happy for the first time , even if she has to use forbidden means to do it.What happens next is simply too taboo to share here. Go ahead and take a peek. It’ll be our little secret. .
author: Aria Cantrelle
